Relevant parts

parts.text: Tamiya twin motor gearbox,1 dc motor,1 SRF05, 2 GP2D12 and a MG995 servo

guide.summary:
Grabber is a robot which picks up bottles that comes in its way as well as avoid objects which cannot be picked up.
It uses 3 sensors i.e. 1 X SRF05 and 2 X sharp GP2D12.
guide.title: Grabber
